name: My Dear Bailey
description:
(This is a submission for Brackeys 2022.2 game jam, whose theme is "You're not alone".)

The lovely Dachshund Bailey's beloved bear-shape dog bed, Bear, is missing. Help Bailey to find Bear and solve the puzzles in Bailey's dream.

---------------Release History---------------

v0.1 released on 28 Aug 2022

---------------Credits---------------

Game Design, Arts, Script Writing       Yuki & Harry

Programming                                                    Yuki
